li.label: awful barrack
li.description: We appreciate the monastic, austere lifestyle, but this place is a PIT.

li.label: dull barrack
li.description: We appreciate the monastic, austere lifestyle, but this place could use a little bit of cleaning and organization.

li.label: austere barrack
li.description: I slept in a barrack with my brothers and sisters. This pleases me.

li.label: well organized barrack
li.description: I slept in a decent, well organized barrack. This is really perfect: the correct way to share a communal living space. I love it.

li.label: contemplative barrack
li.description: I got to sleep in a pretty nice barrack. A nice place to meditate and contemplate the reality of human condition, but I'd prefer it if it was simpler.

li.label: impressive barrack
li.description: I got to sleep in an impressive barrack. I honestly think it is too much. I would prefer simpler accomodations.

li.label: too luxurious barrack
li.description: I slept in a quite luxurious barrack. I honestly think it is too much. I would prefer simpler accomodations.

li.label: extremely impressive barrack
li.description: I slept in an extremely impressive barrack. I honestly think this is way too much. We need to tone down the obscene display of wealth.

li.label: unbelievably impressive barrack
li.description: The barrack I slept in was too impressive. We are not princes and living in such a palace is obscene.

li.label: wondrously impressive barrack
li.description: Disgusting. An obscene display of wealth and vice.
